original_text: Then the angel of the Lord moved on ahead and stood in a narrow place where there was no room to turn, either to the right or to the left.
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 더 나아가서 좌우로 피할 데 없는 좁은 곳에 선지라

sentences.original_text: Then the angel of the Lord moved on ahead
and stood in a narrow place
where there was no room to turn
either to the right or to the left
